price: 16. S’Il voulait, Il vous ferait disparaître et vous remplacerait par d’autres créatures.
arabic: إِن يَشَأۡ يُذۡهِبۡكُمۡ وَيَأۡتِ بِخَلۡقٖ جَدِيدٖ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: in yasha yudh'hib'kum wayati bikhalqin jadīdin
